document_data.name: Augelite
document_data.mainbody: '''Augelite''' was an [[Ornamental stones|ornamental stone]] found in [[Faer√ªn]]. and worn by [[priest]]s of [[Akadi]] for jewelry and [[holy symbol]]s.
document_data.Description: This gemstone was transparent, colorless, and soft enough to carve without special tools or exceptional skill, but too soft for intricate carving because it tended to split. A typical specimen had a base value of 10 [[gp]].
document_data.Powers: The power of this stone was its antipathy to [[magic]]. Spells were slightly easier to resist, and magically-induced injury was slightly lessened within a 10 ft (3 m) radius around an augelite gem.
